# Interface LocalStreamingSTTConfig

Configuration for local streaming STT

This interface was referenced by `InworldBasicConfigurationSchema`'s JSON-Schema via the `definition` "LocalStreamingSTTConfig".

interface LocalStreamingSTTConfig {  
stt_model_path: string;  
vad_model_path: string;  
}

## Properties

### stt_model_path

stt_model_path: string

Path to the STT model weights file

Path to the VAD model weights file
